english.segment1: I want to set. The story straight. It's time to tell. The truth
english.segment2: I never could. Have come so far. If it were not. For You
english.segment3: You covered up my sin. You covered up my silence. You covered up my shame. You made me new again
english.segment4: Chorus: It's all because of You..
english.segment5: They tell me to. Abandon You. To make my dreams. Come true
english.segment6: So what am I. Supposed to do?. I only dream. Of You
english.segment7: You covered up my sin. You covered up my silence. You covered up my shame. I am new again
